name: Mirror Bound
description:
Mirror Bound is a simple 2D puzzle game where you try to move two characters into the target zone at the same time. The only problem is that one of the characters mirrors all of your movements! See if you can beat all ten levels, and challenge your friends to beat your fastest time!

Controls: Use WASD or arrow keys to move; hold shift to creep (move more slowly).

This game was made for Weekly Game Jam #148 - Mirror. If development were to continue, these are some features I'd like to add:

  • More exciting art/animations
  • Enemies and obstacles that try to kill you
  • More levels
  • An in-game level builder

Thank you for checking out Mirror Bound!

Thank you to my brothers, Joseph and Ryan, for helping me with the level design and music!
